## Schema

### Required

- `address_id` (String) Rendezvous Point address

    |  Format &emsp; | Description  |
    |----------|---------------|
    |  ipv4  &emsp; |  Rendezvous Point address  |

### Optional

- `group` (List of String) Group Address range

    |  Format &emsp; | Description  |
    |----------|---------------|
    |  ipv4net  &emsp; |  Group Address range RFC 3171  |
